articles.title: Scientists Create “Extraordinary” Mouse Using Gene Older Than Animal Life Itself - SciTechDaily
articles.description: New research unveils the evolutionary origins of stem cells through a groundbreaking experiment that successfully created a mouse using ancient genetic tools. Published in Nature Communications, an international team of researchers has achieved a groundbreaki…
articles.content: The mouse on the left is a chimeric with dark eyes and patches of black fur, a result of stem cells derived from a choanoflagellate Sox gene. The wildtype mouse on the right has red eyes and all whit… [+4975 chars]

articles.author: Zack Whittaker
articles.title: Apple says Mac users targeted in zero-day cyberattacks - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple said the security update for Macs, iPhones, and iPads is "recommended for all users."
articles.content:
Apple released security updates on Tuesday that it says are “recommended for all users,” after fixing a pair of security bugs used in active cyberattacks targeting Mac users.
